name: Midnight Bus
description:
It's late. You have to take the bus to get back home. However, something is different tonight. Which stop are you going to get off at?

Midnight Bus is a first person experience with a more retro look. Take the bus to return home and make the choices to see everything the night has to offer.

Inputs:

AWSD - Movement

E - Interaction

Q - Lighter

Team

Ana and Isa - Scenery

Artur - Characters

Leonardo - Bus and Sounds

Mello -  Coding

Ramon- Animations

Will - Game Design

Colares -  Translation

The game was developed in 3 weeks + 1 week for  bugfixes and minor improvements.

Game available in English and Portuguese.
